verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As a people travail in the heat of the sun
There is hope in the victory of the Lord.
With a heart that is groaning, the battle's begun
To recover, redeem and restore.
Chorus:
So we fight for our brothers
And fight for our sons,
Go up for our daughters and wives.
Fight for the house
For the battle's begun
And cry Victory! in the name of our God,
And cry Victory! in the name of our God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though the night closes in, we remain on the wall
With a vision that shines like the day.
Though the rubble surrounds us, not one man shall fall
For together we work and we say...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
With a spade in one hand and a sword at our side,
The sound of the trumpet will call.
With our hearts trained for war as the battle draws nigh,
We will fight at our place on the wall.
